original: Saraṇo anuppanno dhammo nasaraṇassa naanuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā tīṇi, upanissaye cattāri.
analyzed: saraṇaḥ anuppannaḥ dhammaḥ na saraṇassa na anuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ ārammaṇe cattāri adhipatiyā tīṇi upanissaye cattāri

original: Araṇo uppādī dhammo naaraṇassa nauppādissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Araṇo
analyzed: araṇaḥ uppādī dhammaḥ na araṇassa na uppādissa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ araṇaḥ

original: uppādī dhammo nasaraṇassa nauppādissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇe
analyzed: uppādī dhammaḥ na saraṇassa na auppādissa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ ārammaṇe
